meanings.definition: To boast or talk with excessive pride about one's achievements or possessions.
meanings.sent1: He always brags about his new car to everyone he meets.
meanings.sent2: She brags about her cooking skills whenever guests come over.
meanings.sent3: The little boy brags about his toy collection to his friends at school.
meanings.sent4: The peacock brags about its colorful feathers to attract a mate.
meanings.sent5: The student brags about acing the test to impress the teacher.

meanings.definition: A statement in which one boasts about oneself.
meanings.sent1: Her constant brags about her achievements annoy her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The article was full of his brags about his business success.
meanings.sent3: His brags about being the best singer in town made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The book was filled with the character's brags about their bravery.
meanings.sent5: The child's brags about their drawing skills were met with applause.
